title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 June 2015 - XWiki
content:
<Sorinello\_> has quit  
02:52 <sdumitriu> has quit  
02:57 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
06:01 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
06:03 <Denis> has quit  
08:10 <Sorinello\_> has joined #xwiki  
08:11 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
08:55 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:55 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:58 <DarkKnightCZ1> has joined #xwiki  
09:02 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
09:04 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:05 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:23 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
09:33 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:39 <DarkKnightCZ1> has quit  
09:39 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
09:44 <tmortagne> and now lets wait hours for OW2...  
09:44 <vmassol> :)  
09:46 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
09:47 <vmassol> our CI has a lot of jobs errors… not a very good shape  
09:47 <tmortagne> it's always like this when we create a new branch  
09:48 <vmassol> I'm talking about the existing branches  
09:48 <vmassol> 6.4 shouldn't be impacted for ex  
09:49 <tmortagne> packager plugoin  
09:49 <tmortagne> \*plugin  
09:49 <tmortagne> as usual  
09:50 <vmassol> Caused by: org.sonatype.aether.transfer.ArtifactNotFoundException: Could not find artifact org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-store:pom:6.4.4-SNAPSHOT in local.central (file:///home/huds  
09:50 <vmassol> onagent/.m2/repository)  
09:51 <vmassol> ok that's because we don't rebuild everytihng  
09:51 <vmassol> (and I cleaned the agents local repos yesterday)  
09:51 <vmassol> so if you have a partial build it'll fail  
09:51 <vmassol> (I guess)  
09:51 <tmortagne> it should still find it remotely...  
09:52 <vmassol> hmm indeed  
09:53 <tmortagne> the build should not be impacted on what is or is not in the local repository, the the point of using -U  
09:54 <vmassol> store-api is downloaded fine, but not store-pom  
09:54 <vmassol> maybe we don't have any dep on it  
09:54 <vmassol> whihc is likely  
09:54 <vmassol> (since it's a pom)  
09:54 <vmassol> and parents are not part of the download chain  
09:55 <vmassol> (this is an issue I had raised on maven, need to find the jira again)  
09:56 <vmassol> here: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MNG-5542  
09:57 <vmassol> so the issue is with the partial buld which doesn't take into account parents  
09:57 <cjd> has quit  
10:07 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
10:16 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:17 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
10:18 <Denis2> is now known as <Denis>  
10:23 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:46 <gsmeria> has quit  
11:59 <cjd> hey evalica, thank you very much for looking at totem !  
12:00 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
12:02 <cjd> We should probably think about coordinating more closely in the future since just as your proposal came in, we are looking to put totem on the back burner for a while and start addressing different things...  However I still think it will be useful now that the technology is in the hands of users, it's only a matter of time before people begin demanding additional work...  
12:12 <gsmeria> has quit

20:18 <xwikiorg\_guest\_9> Hi, i'm unable to install xwiki on glassfish 4.0 or 4.1. The log has several "AS-CDI-005" message and afther that it is thorw a nullpointerexception in weld.
